name: Ganesh Seetharaman
summary: Ganesh Seetharaman is a senior IT infrastructure specialist with extensive experience in Oracle Cloud operations, Oracle Enterprise Manager, WebLogic, and solutions management. He has led large-scale implementations, managed cross-functional teams, and delivered end-to-end monitoring, automation, and 24x7 support across heterogeneous environments.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Collaborate with clients to ensure successful implementations. Implement OEM 12c setup, BP, plugins, performance monitoring, and notification setup. Install/upgrade/patch Oracle Database; performance tuning. Install/upgrade/patch Oracle WebLogic servers; deploy applications.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Led cross-functional teams across technical, financial and business disciplines. Focused teams on business objectives and tracked progress to complete milestones on time and on budget. Managed risk through analysis of financial/statistical data, transitioned between agile and waterfall approaches, and created road maps and work breakdown structures. Executed multiple projects including database upgrades (10g to 11g/12c), migration to Oracle Exadata, ASM disk groups, PSU patches, and upgrades of Oracle WebLogic and Web Tier. Managed Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Cloudem12c) for Oracle Public Cloud; deployed OEM 12c sites; managed agents and plugins; troubleshot OMS/Agent issues; automated EM administration via EMCLI; built new EM sites and environments for Cloudem customers.

experience.title: Principal Systems Consultant
experience.company: Oracle Public Cloud - CloudEM Operations Team
experience.description: Part of Oracle Public Cloud's Monitoring Solution team (CloudEM Operations). Oversaw large-scale monitoring of 20,000+ databases plus Fusion Middleware targets and ZFS targets. Built and expanded Enterprise Manager (EM) environments across multiple data centers, installed and configured OMS/agents, SSL, SSO, TAS/SDI provisioning, and ensured high availability for SaaS/PAAS environments. Performed upgrades, patching (PSU), and tuning; implemented backups/recovery (RMAN); administered WebLogic servers; deployed 20+ OEM sites; managed OMS plugins and BP; maintained test beds for fixes.

experience.title: Associate Consultant
experience.description: Installation of Oracle software on Linux boxes; created tablespaces and datafiles following OFA; managed database security and privileges; administered Oracle 10g Application Server; performance tuning using Explain Plan, SQL Trace, TKPROF, RDA, and STATSPACK; applied patches; provided 24x7 on-call production support; performed database reorganization to reduce fragmentation; monitored alert logs and trace files for health and integrity.

education.school: RKM Vivekananda College, University of Madras

certifications: Oracle DBA 10g/11g Admin Workshop I and II (OCP)
Oracle WebLogic Server / Application Server 11g Administration
Exadata and Database Machine Administration Workshop
